compliant.legal provisions: Data collection is limited to what is necessary for the purposes for which it is processed.

compliant.section: Personal data may also include information of your real-time location, your device’s Internet Protocol (IP) address or unique device identifier (UDI).
compliant.legal provisions: Personal data must be processed lawfully, fairly, and transparently.

compliant.section: The collection and use of your Personal data may be necessary for us to provide you with a product or service, communicate with you, or maintain our relationship with you.
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract to which the data subject is party.

compliant.section: We also collect other non-personal types of data, including device information such as the type of browser or operating system used and software usage statistics.
compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization principle - only collect data necessary for the purposes stated.

compliant.section: We use tracking technologies such as cookies (small files placed on your hard drive), web beacons, website analytics tools, and the personal information you provide us to personalize your online experience and improve our services.
Please see our Cookie Policy for additional information, including certain choices you may have regarding some of these activities.
compliant.legal provisions: Transparency and information provision to data subjects.

compliant.section: You agree that we may use your Personal Information for our commercial purposes including for instance: To deliver a product or provide a service you have requested...
compliant.legal provisions: Processing necessary for the performance of a contract.

The policy outlines the conditions under which personal data may be shared with authorized third parties and emphasizes that personal data will not be sold or disclosed without permission, aligning with the principles of consent and purpose limitation.

The policy states that the services are not directed to minors and that personal data from children under the age of 13 will not be knowingly collected, complying with the requirements for the protection of minors.

The policy mentions that personal data may be transferred to other countries and outlines compliance with international data protection laws, which aligns with the requirements for cross-border data transfers.
The policy states that personal data will not be retained longer than necessary, which complies with the principle of data minimization and retention.
The organization takes reasonable measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
Users are informed about third-party services and the lack of control over their privacy practices.

non_compliant.section: We may retain this information to remember you whenever you log in.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Personal data must be kept in a form which permits identification of data subjects for no longer than is necessary for the purposes for which the personal data are processed.
non_compliant.amend: Specify retention periods for personal data and the criteria used to determine those periods.

non_compliant.section: If you choose not to provide us with Personal data, we may not be able to provide you with such, in part or at all.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The data subject should be informed of the consequences of failing to provide personal data.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the specific consequences of not providing personal data, including which services may be affected.

non_compliant.section: Some web browsers may have settings for 'Do Not Track' signals. Browsers may have this signal on or off by default, and there is no standard as to how websites should respond. We do not currently monitor or take action regarding these signals.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to object to processing - users should have the ability to opt-out of tracking.
non_compliant.amend: Implement a mechanism to respect 'Do Not Track' signals or provide clear opt-out options.

non_compliant.section: To communicate with you through emails, text messages or phone calls about our products and services, targeted marketing materials, service updates, and promotional offers;
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent must be obtained for direct marketing communications.
non_compliant.amend: Ensure explicit consent is obtained for marketing communications.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy allows for the disclosure of personal data to comply with legal processes and government requests without explicit consent, which may not fully align with the requirement for explicit consent under TWPDP.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify that explicit consent will be sought where possible before disclosing personal data for legal compliance, or provide a more detailed explanation of the circumstances under which personal data may be disclosed.

non_compliant.legal provisions: While the policy states that personal data will not be shared for promotional purposes without permission, it does not specify the criteria for selecting authorized third parties or the safeguards in place to protect personal data shared with them.
non_compliant.amend: Include specific criteria for selecting third parties and detail the safeguards implemented to protect personal data when shared with authorized vendors.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Users should be explicitly informed about the risks of disclosing personal information in public areas, including the potential for misuse.
Users should be notified of any changes to the privacy policy in a timely manner, including how they will be informed.
